title: Fail to import a definition file with DisplayOrder set to 0 in AccessTypeRoles when Display is set to True
specs: contains a definition file with new tab AccessTypeRoles with DisplayOrder set to 0 when Display is set to True

body.__plainTextValue__: Validation errors occurred importing the spreadsheet.- 'DisplayOrder' must be greater than 0 in column 'DisplayOrder' in the sheet 'AccessTypeRoles'
